name: AToZ Service
description: AtoZ service site is a MERN stack site. user can book any service through login & registration (authentication) system, user can search it and software related service And confirm service through payment with card ,can cancel booking and can see his booking list , booking status, And user can give Review, Admin Can make any user(not customer) admin , only admin can manage any booking  , manage any services by category ,can add any new services, admin can add experts, can update book status after payment.
technology: Reactjs , Custom hook, Context APi,React Router ,Custom css, Bootstrap,Firebase , Expressjs, mongodb, jwt token, Stripe Payment gateway

name: sunglassShopBD
description: Developed a fully functioning Niche Product web app . user can Purchase any Product through login & registration (authentication) system And confirm order through payment with card , cancel order and can see his order list , order status, And user can give Review Admin Can make any user(not customer) admin , only admin can manage any order , manage any product ,can add any new Product.
technology: Reactjs , Custom hook, Context APi,React Router ,Custom css, Bootstrap,Firebase , Expressjs, mongodb, jwt token, Stripe Payment gateway

name: Adventure Travel
description: user can place and confirm his booking by login with google as well as he can cancel his booking
technology: : Reactjs, hook form, Context APi, Bootstrap, Firebase,Expressjs,Mongodb
